Conditional Use

It is a condition of use of this site that if the user (a) possesses any male children of fighting age then at least one(1) shall be immediately relinquished to the owner of this site, (b) does not possess any sons then in the event of the birth of the first son the child shall be immediately relinquished to the owner of this site, for use in my child soldier army

Intellectual Property Rights (Fake and made up concept)

Excluding content which cannot be considered transformative, and thus isn't owned by me, all content on this website is public domain. Do whatever you want with it, why don't your print it off using your Dads printer and staple it to electricity poles in your local area
Phil Lord - c3401807 - c3401807@uon.edu.au
Copyright isn't real, excluding content which cannot be considered transformative, all content on this website is public domain. Do whatever you want with it, why don't your print it off using your Dads printer and staple it to electricity poles in your local area.
